name: fclsfil
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))

stmt.origin: simp2bi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wcel(c1, ctop), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cv(hs0)))))
stmt.pretty: simp2bi(c0 ∈(c1[fClus]c2), c2 ∈(Fil ` c3), c1 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈((cls ` c1)` hs0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cv(hs0))))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[fClus]c2)→ c2 ∈(Fil ` c3))
⊣ (c0 ∈(c1[fClus]c2)↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c3)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈((cls ` c1)` hs0))))
